languages.text: "Меня не устраивает жестокость методов дознания блюстителей. Приказываю прекратить насилие".
"I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."
languages.original_text: "Меня не устраивает жестокость методов дознания блюстителей. Приказываю прекратить насилие".

traits.locale_text: "I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."
"I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."
"I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."
"I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."
"I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."

languages.text: “我对执法者的暴力审讯很不满意。你们必须禁止一切暴力行为，这是命令。”
languages.original_text: "I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."

traits.locale_text: “我对执法者的暴力审讯很不满意。你们必须禁止一切暴力行为，这是命令。”

languages.text: «No me agrada la severidad de los métodos de interrogatorio de los guardias. Que no vuelvan a emplear la violencia; es una orden».
languages.original_text: "I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."

traits.locale_text: «No me agrada la severidad de los métodos de interrogatorio de los guardias. Que no vuelvan a emplear la violencia; es una orden».

languages.text: 「執行官の過酷な尋問方法を快く思わない。暴力の行使をやめろ。これは命令だ」
languages.original_text: "I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."

traits.locale_text: 「執行官の過酷な尋問方法を快く思わない。暴力の行使をやめろ。これは命令だ」

languages.text: "Mir gefallen die brutalen Verhörmethoden der Enforcer nicht. Ihr werdet die Gewalttätigkeiten einstellen. Das ist ein Befehl!"
languages.original_text: "I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."

traits.locale_text: "Mir gefallen die brutalen Verhörmethoden der Enforcer nicht. Ihr werdet die Gewalttätigkeiten einstellen. Das ist ein Befehl!"

languages.text: « Les méthodes d'interrogatoire musclées des prévôts me dérangent. Vous allez cesser immédiatement de recourir à la violence, c'est un ordre. »
languages.original_text: "I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."

traits.locale_text: « Les méthodes d'interrogatoire musclées des prévôts me dérangent. Vous allez cesser immédiatement de recourir à la violence, c'est un ordre. »

languages.text: "İnfazcıların sert sorgu yöntemleri beni huzursuz ediyor. Şiddet kullanımına son vereceksin. Bu bir emirdir."
languages.original_text: "I am not comfortable with the enforcers' harsh interrogation methods. You will cease the use of violence — that is an order."
